lead_paragraph: John Scott sat on his teammates shoulders while fans chanted "M-V-P! M-V-P!" and the NHL finally got out of the way.

headline.print_headline: John Scott, Fan Vote as Captain, Gets MVP at All-Star Game
headline.main: John Scott, Fan Vote as Captain, Gets MVP at All-Star Game
